msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

This fixes the use of constraints in effects. Basically, it removes the 'adjustConstraints' property that was added in Flex4 and adds a new 'disableConstraints' flag which disables constraints during the effect (default false).
QE Notes: Issues in spark/effects/AnimateTransform* directories, rename-related, Matt chasing down
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
1st pass of rename according to the spec http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Dropping+the+Fx+Prefix

Flex now requires CSS Style declarations to declare @namespace rules and disambiguate between halo and spark components using CSS 3 namespace prefixes on type selectors. At compile time, this namespace information will be used to map type names to qualified ActionScript class names. At runtime, type selectors are matched on qualified ActionScript class name (for example mx.controls.Button rather than just Button). Flex 3 applications must be compiled with -compatibility-version=3.0.0 to get unqualified CSS type selector behavior.
QE: Yes, this build may help in updating test cases to use the new namespaces and class names.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix for bug around handling of constraints during and after effects were run, both for old and new effects. Fix was to correctly record and handle styles that were set or not set in either state and to temporarily set width/height values for the duration of an effect if we disabled the relevant styles that affect width/height.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixes to deal with startDelay being incorporated correctly into the underlying keyframes of an animation.
Testing: checkintests, Mustella Effects, ListDataEffects, mx/effects
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Minor fixes to deal with corner cases where developers try to play keyframe-less MotionPaths or call getValue() outside of an effect actually playing.
Testing: checkintests, Mustella Effects, ListDataEffects, mx/effects
